txt.en: You mark the spread of the disease in the bog-lurker
You mark the spread of the disease in the gore-crow
Tancram has asked you to defeat boars and wolves in plague-ridden Agarnaith, and to <rgb=#00FF00>look</rgb> at several other creatures in order to gauge the spread of the disease.
You mark the spread of the disease in the plague-rat
Tancram is in the Hall of the King.
Defeated Plagued Dire-wolves in Agarnaith ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Defeated Diseased Swamp-boars in Agarnaith ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
<rgb=#00FF00>Look</rgb> at a Bloody Plague-fly in Agarnaith
<rgb=#00FF00>Look</rgb> at a Bloody Bog-lurker in Agarnaith
Tancram has asked you to perform a casual study of some of the creatures that crawl or fly in plague-ridden Agarnaith.
<rgb=#00FF00>Look</rgb> at an Agarnaith Gore-crow
<rgb=#00FF00>Look</rgb> at an Infectious Plague-rat in Agarnaith

'If your travels will take you to Agarnaith, I have something with which you could help me. I have heard the worries of Mithrandir and others concerning some foul disease that spreads within the swamps of Agarnaith. I ask that you defeat the boars and wolves that you find there, for the disease has caused them to engage in a frenzied madness.\n\n'I ask too that you <rgb=#00FF00>look</rgb> at a number of infected creatures and provide your opinion on the disease's spread. I am interested especially in plague-flies, bog-lurkers, gore-crows, and infectious plague-rats. Good luck to you, [placeholder], and know that you will be rewarded for your observations.'
You mark the spread of the disease in the plague-fly
Defeat Plagued Dire-wolves in Agarnaith ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Defeat Diseased Swamp-boars in Agarnaith ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

'You have returned! I trust that you have brought your report on the infected creatures of Agarnaith?'

You tell Tancram what you observed, and he notes your observations on a small piece of parchment.

'Thank you for this, [placeholder]. Gondor needs as much information about the spread of this disease as can be obtained. Come back tomorrow for more work, my friend.'

'I have heard the worries of Mithrandir and others concerning some foul disease that spreads within the swamps of Agarnaith. I ask that you defeat the boars and wolves that you find there, for the disease has caused them to engage in a frenzied madness.\n\n'I ask too that you <rgb=#00FF00>look</rgb> at a number of infected creatures and provide your opinion on the disease's spread. I am interested especially in plague-flies, bog-lurkers, gore-crows, and infectious plague-rats. Good luck to you, [placeholder], and know that you will be rewarded for your observations.'
Bring your report on the spread of the disease to Tancram in the Hall of the King
Daily Request: A Casual Study
